content.description: Source: Centre for the Study of Public Policy, RusssiaVotes.org, 2016
content.question: Which of the following best describes the trend in the data for Independents?

choices.label: The number of Independents increased between 1993 and 2016.
The number of Independents decreased between 1993 and 2016.
The number of Independents remained constant between 1993 and 1999, then increased between 1999 and 2016.
The number of Independents increased between 1993 and 1999, then decreased between 1999 and 2016.

content.answer: The number of Independents decreased between 1993 and 2016.

unit.text: 4: Party and Electoral Systems and Citizen Organizations

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Describe patterns and trends in data.
